title: I just KNOW I've seen this font before but can't for the life of me ID it. Help!
content:
My first post!

I'm designing a business card for a mobile pet grooming business and they asked me to include this font. I'm 99 percent sure I've seen it before, I've tried WhatTheFont and other font search tools but so far no cigarette.

I yield to the powers of the internet's hive mind now...

Your help is much appreciated. :)

Peaces,

-Jules

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DOG FONT.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012190136/http:/typophile.com/files/DOG%20FONT.jpg) | 25.93 KB |
author: wordserf

comments.content:
It must be **[Gloo Gun](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012190136/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=GlooGun%20-%20Regular&fid=08a4386c0759a8e85dd9706735e9a436&fsize=60&text=Gypsy%20Dog&fit=1)** by Ben Balvanz (1998, Fontalicious Fonts, Free for personal use)

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012190136/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
